profile.name: Dustin Henderson
profile.headline: STEM-gifted problem solver with exceptional communication skills. Built long-range radio communication system, decoded Russian military transmissions, and consistently provides the critical intellectual breakthrough when teams are stuck.
profile.executiveSummary: A natural engineer and communicator who combines deep STEM curiosity with unusual social intelligence for someone his age. Known for building functional technology solutions from available components, decoding complex patterns, and maintaining team morale during crisis situations. Winner of regional science fair for work on electromagnetism. Currently the youngest licensed amateur radio operator in Hawkins County.

evidence.outcome: Built long-range radio transmitter 'Cerebro' capable of intercontinental communication
evidence.description: Designed and constructed radio system powerful enough to reach girlfriend in Utah from Indiana using salvaged and purchased components

evidence.outcome: Won Hawkins Middle School Science Fair with electromagnetic research project
evidence.description: Demonstrated understanding of electromagnetism through original research and practical demonstration

evidence.outcome: Established and maintained reliable radio communication network for crisis response team
evidence.description: Provided critical communication infrastructure when conventional systems were unavailable or compromised

evidence.outcome: Intercepted and decoded Russian military radio transmissions revealing secret operation
evidence.description: Identified anomalous radio signals, recorded transmissions, and coordinated translation effort

evidence.outcome: Identified repeating pattern in intercepted Russian transmissions enabling translation
evidence.description: Applied analytical skills to recognize encoded communication pattern that adults had missed

evidence.outcome: Decoded compass anomaly revealing electromagnetic interference from alternate dimension
evidence.description: Connected apparently random compass behavior to underlying electromagnetic phenomenon

evidence.outcome: Applied systematic hypothesis testing to understand interdimensional phenomena
evidence.description: Used scientific methodology to develop and test theories about events that defied conventional explanation

evidence.outcome: Coordinated multi-team operations across 3 simultaneous mission groups
evidence.description: Served as communications hub and tactical coordinator for dispersed teams during crisis events

evidence.outcome: Diagnosed and repaired electronic equipment under field conditions
evidence.description: Applied technical knowledge to troubleshoot and fix communication and electronic equipment during operations

evidence.outcome: Identified and cared for unknown species (D'Artagnan) conducting behavioral observation
evidence.description: Applied scientific curiosity and care to study unknown organism, documenting behavioral patterns

evidence.outcome: Navigated underground tunnel system using compass and topographic mapping
evidence.description: Applied orienteering skills to navigate dangerous unknown terrain

evidence.outcome: Explained complex scientific concepts to non-technical team members enabling collective problem-solving
evidence.description: Translated electromagnetism, radio theory, and dimensional physics into understandable terms

evidence.outcome: Self-taught radio engineering, cryptanalysis, and advanced electromagnetism before high school
evidence.description: Pursued deep learning in technical subjects driven by genuine curiosity rather than external requirements

evidence.outcome: Provided critical breakthrough insight in 4 out of 4 crisis events
evidence.description: Consistently identified the key connection or solution that moved the team from stuck to actionable

evidence.outcome: Maintained team morale and humor during life-threatening situations
evidence.description: Provided emotional resilience and levity that kept team functioning when stress was highest

evidence.outcome: Maintained unwavering loyalty to friends across 4 crisis events spanning 3 years
evidence.description: Never abandoned teammates regardless of personal risk or pressure

evidence.outcome: Served as primary communicator and diplomat for the group across all crisis events
evidence.description: Applied natural verbal skills to negotiate, persuade, and coordinate across different personality types

evidence.outcome: Spent 3 months building Cerebro radio through trial, error, and iterative improvement
evidence.description: Demonstrated sustained effort on complex technical project despite multiple failures and setbacks

workHistory.title: Student
workHistory.description: Honor roll student with focus on science and mathematics. Science fair winner. Active in AV Club and amateur radio.

purpose: Science isn't just about knowing stuff. It's about figuring stuff out when nobody else can. That's what I do.
